bibl.title: Still Further Notes on Papyrus Documents with the Imperial Oath.
bibl.note: Continued from: ZPE 89 (1991) pp. 91-102; 90 (1992) p. 258. - Object of the Oath. - Introductory Verb. - Liability Clauses. - P. Cairo Inv. 10580 + 10488 (= S.B. XIV, 11548); P. Paris Louvre Inv. App. 672 (= S.B. I, 4820).
bibl.seg: PACKMAN Zola M., Still Further Notes on Papyrus Documents with the Imperial Oath.
